snippet.title: Cadence Release Date Trailer
snippet.description: Immerse yourself in a unique blend of rhythmic combat and challenging boss fights. In this top-down action game, each of the 10 bosses move, attack, and change patterns in sync with the music, demanding precise timing and quick reactions. You'll need to read their rhythmic cues, dodge, and strike in harmony with the beat to survive. With every encounter, the music guides the flow of battle, creating an intense, immersive experience where combat feels like part of the soundtrack. Master the rhythm, adapt to dynamic patterns, and overcome difficult fights in this distinctive rhythmic boss-rush.
